content: good write Shirley Lee. Point is Shirley college life and the life after that when you start working is vastly different.Your college will only help you to enter into work life and nothing more than that.After that point,you are on your own and you must carve your own path to go ahead. I am not telling to take up any job.What I am telling is SURVIVE till you get what you are dreaming.SURVIVAL is important to stay motivated towards your dreams.
